{W}{U}: [b]CONFECT[/b] Gather a crowd of loyal candy citizens, then overwhelm your opponent with powerful activated abilities.
{U}{B}: [b]PROWESS[/b] Use a bevy of cheap noncreature spells to temporarily buff your creatures and manipulate the battlefield.
{B}{R}: [b]MATHEMATICAL [/b]Cast as many spells as you can with freestyle, then drop a mathematical haymaker.
{R}{G}: [b]MODIFIED[/b] Build up your creatures with equipment, auras, and counters and beat down.
{G}{W}: [b]GROW WIDE RAMP[/b] Ramp into an army of creatures, then use team buffs to swing in for lethal damage.
{W}{B}: [b]SACRIFICE [/b]Sacrifice various permanent types for value and to trigger aristocrat abilities.
{U}{R}: [b]MADNESS[/b] Turn discarding into advantage with a council of insane wizards.
{B}{G}: [b]GRAVEYARD[/b] Get cards into your graveyard, then use them for value with abilities like delve and disturb.
{R}{W}: [b]ADVENTUROUS[/b] Form a band of adventurers that reduce the cost of and benefit from cards you cast from exile.
{G}{U}: [b]RELICS [/b]Unearth the secrets of the past, accumulating clues to overwhelm your opponent with value.
